::Autofire::

Autofire lands the pod, the hatch opening.

"Energon usually," he says, exiting the shuttle, "Equipment, stuff 
like that. I get to keep that pod, and you provide me with energon 
and other resources to keep it going, as well as let me use your base 
for repairs and the like, and I fight for you."

He transforms into beast mode, something between a sabre-tooth tiger 
and a monster from legends. His shape was that of the tiger's, but he 
was much bigger, with scales instead of fur. There were two bumps in 
his back where his jetpack was. He approaches the energon, intending 
on mining it.

"If someone makes me a better offer, I will give you two weeks to top 
it, during which I won't serve either you or the other patron, and if 
you don't top the offer, I go to them. But I don't switch sides in 
less than two weeks, so you don't have to worry about me during 
battles and missions."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron took the cube, and almost greedily consumed it. It didnt 
matter if
> he was fully recovered, he didnt want to fight this robot, for this 
robot
> was probably his chance to greatness. He stood back up, flexing his 
metalic
> arms from the surge of energy, he must have more he thought. "Thank 
you" he
> said, then he looked puzzled for a moment. "What kind of payment do 
you
> take?" Megatron asked curiously. Normally in most of the metallic 
planets,
> energon was used as currency. Now he didnt know what this robot 
wanted.
